name: Ivy the Kiwi?
summary: Players of all ages are encouraged to aide Ivy on her journey, utilizing the Wii Remote or Nintendo DS stylus to create the stretchy and flexible vines that propel Ivy forward, over and through obstacles before her. Players encounter crows, rats, raindrops and more, all of which aim to hinder Ivy's progress. But every story's hero finds a way, and Ivy soon finds an ally in the unlikeliest of places-the strange vines that erupt forth to guide, protect and propel her on her way. As skill improves, players must more carefully and quickly manipulate the trusty vines in new ways and utilize the game's distinct mode of transport.

name: Ivan ''Ironman'' Stewart's Super Off Road
summary:
Enter the world of off-road racing as 4 vehicles will face each other, on a series of tracks which are based around flipped and reversed versions of a core selection. Fame, glory and bikini clad women await your victories and the taste of dirt awaits if you fail. Let a computer car beat you and you lose one of your 3 credits.

Successful races bring more money, which can be used to soup up their machine. Boosts to top speed, grip and acceleration can be purchased, and your nitro boost must be kept topped up. If you are desperate for upgrades, you can buy into your spare credits.

Only your off-road driving abilities will be enough to pull you to first place in these races. Play alone or with up to 3 other players (depending on the version) in this classic arcade game.

name: Ivanhoe
summary:
Ivanhoe is side-scrolling action, combat and adventure game, developed by Ocean France and published by Ocean Software.

The game is loosely based on the classic 19th-century novel "Ivanhoe" by Sir Walter Scott, which tells the story of a noble knight during the time of Richard the Lionheart and the Crusades.

name: I've Got Your Number
summary:
Press 1 on the alpha-numeric keyboard.

The screen will display a giant electronic blackboard filled with orbiting numbers and symbols.

Player 1 appears at the left side of the screen. Player 2 appears at the right side of the screen. Each player stands on a scoring box which will automatically count up each correct answer.

The left hand control unit activates the left hand player on the screen. The right hand control unit activates the player at the right hand of the screen. Push the joy stick away from you to walk your player toward the top of the screen. Pull the joy stick toward you to walk your player to the bottom of the screen. Push the joy stick left to go left. Push it right to go right.

An addition, subtraction or symbol problem will appear at the base of the screen. The answer will appear somewhere in the orbiting numbers and symbols.

Each player races to the correct number or symbol with the electronic figure.

When a player catches a correct answer, a point is scored and the solution is displayed at the bottom of the screen. A new problem will then be presented.

If a player catches an incorrect answer, he is sent back to the starting position and the incorrect number or symbol is automatically removed from the screen. This process of elimination will eventually guide the players to the correct answer through a positive learning experience.

The winner is the first player to score ten correct answers. The winner receives an electronic pat on the back and a musical salute.

A new game will automatically start after each ten point round.

Some correct answers will appear in the center of the orbits and will be more difficult to reach. Press the action button to lower the electronic figure's head to duck through the orbit without touching a wrong answer.

This game is programmed so that it may be played by children who do not yet comprehend numbers. At the first level, a child may enter a matching symbol and it will score as a correct answer. The level of play will move up as the players grow more proficient.

name: I've Got Some Balls!
summary: players use power ups and collect diamonds while navigating levels as a metal ball.

name: I've Got to Run: Complete Edition!
summary: I've Got to Run: Complete Edition! is a 2D autorunning platformer where you guide Roy the Marshmallow Boy and his friends through a series of levels that become more difficult the longer you last. The game features six distinct modes:

name: I've Got to Run!
summary: I've Got to Run! challenges players to compete for the highest score they can in this exhilarating randomly generating autorunning platformer.

name: Ivy the Kiwi? Mini
summary: A bite-sized chunk of Ivy the Kiwi?

name: Ivanych vs Eared Beast
summary: Do you like to surmount obstacles? Are you a thrill-seeker? How about having real Russian fun with all your heart? It's high time to try this droll addictive runner that will keep you on your toes! Cheer up and act! Crush the walls and help Ivanich to catch up the eared beast! Shoot at the ice walls and don't let that little furry coward tweak your ears!

name: Ivanoile ~ Christalixeur Corruption
summary: "Ivanoile ~ Christalixeur Corruption" is a story in an episodic format. Haley, an orphan. Ivanoile, a Christalixeur. Their own Corruption. The Christalixeur’s Corruption.

name: I've Got a Brand New Pair of Legs
summary:
I've Got A Brand New Pair Of Legs is a puzzle-platform game where you must figure out the best selection of legs to use to traverse each level!

Chris wants to get from point A to point B and he wants to eat his share of pizzas on the way. But the environments are dangerous and can not be traversed with human legs alone...

Thankfully, Chris has the power to replace his legs on the fly!

That pizza is too high up; giraffe legs make Chris tall.
Chris can't breath in water; duck legs make Chris float.
There are spikes on the floor; frog legs make Chris jump.
These are just a few of the types of legs to help Chris on his way!

Chris is very clumsy; if he collides with an obstacle or bumps his head, he'll lose a pair of legs! This will hinder your ability to complete the level.

Some levels can only be finished with certain legs, so you'll have to figure out which legs are most suitable based on the types of traps you encounter.

name: IVAO: International Virtual Aviation Organisation
summary: IVAO is the world's Flight Simulation Family. a highly-realistic flight simulation and air traffic control simulation network, provided to aviation enthusiasts.

name: I’ve Transmigrated as the Supreme Villainess... But I Have No Idea WTF I’m Supposed to Do!
summary: Parody Visual Novel of Soul Union.

name: I've Been Busy Being Dead
summary: Сontrol a cute ghost, haunt various objects to scare people to death, thus stealing their freedom!

name: I've Seen Everything
summary: In the "I've Seen Everything" quiz, you will need to recognize what is being shown in the picture and choose the correct answer out of four options. There are several game modes: single-player mode with an AI, no opponent mode, and multiplayer mode (four players maximum).

name: I've Seen Everything: More Actresses
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Actresses" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Actors
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Actors" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Animals
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Animals" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Painters
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Painters" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Musical Instruments
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Musical Instruments" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Minerals
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Minerals" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Fishes
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Fishes" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Singers
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Singers" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Mythological Creatures
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Mythological Creatures" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Dinosaurs
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Dinosaurs" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Persons
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Persons" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Fruits
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Fruits and Vegetables" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: Cars
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Cars" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: Cold Steel
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Cold Steel" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: Cats
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Cats" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: Dogs
summary: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Dogs" category.

name: Ivan "Ironman" Stewart's Super Off Road
summary: Is a port for Tiger's LCD Handheld devices.

name: I've Seen Everything: Birds
summary: This DLC contains questions for the "Birds" category.

name: Ivoverse
summary:
Ivoverso is a PvP battle game connected to Twitch chat via commands, and also a collection of NFT cards.
Users compete by logging in with chat commands to be the last to survive in 1v1 matches with randomly assigned cards from the Ivoverse! If they also have NFTs from the collection, they will receive a life bonus in each battle!

name: Ivaxion
summary: Ivaxion is a turn based tactics RPG focused heavily on its strategic gameplay with no luck based elements.

name: Ivri
summary: IVRI immerses players in a gripping space adventure where they navigate an eerie, abandoned space station, meticulously piecing together the puzzle of the missing crew and uncovering the enigmatic secrets hidden within the ship's walls, delivering an enthralling narrative experience.

name: Ivorfall
summary: Ivorfall City is in danger and only you have what it takes to save it! Ivorfall is a Steampunk, roguelike, twin-stick shooter where you take up the mantle of Detective Flintlock who must face off against hordes of enemies in destructible environments.

name: Ivor
summary: A blood-pumping throwback FPS set in a Norse-inspired world. The undead have risen and Ivor, the Drengr, has awakened. Take up your axes, load your shotgun, and get to killing.

name: I've Fallen For You!
summary: Eight women simultaneously appear in your life, offering you unconditional love and support! Will you choose to uphold your beliefs and become a good man, or give in to human temptations and become a bad man?

name: Ivayami: Cradle of Fog
summary: Four friends decide to visit an abandoned city. When the trip is is suddenly cut short by a car accident, Cynthia Moriyama must traverse through the dense fog of Ivayami searching for her missing friends. Beware, as the fog hides more than you imagine

name: Ivan
summary: Trapped in the middle of Siberia in an isolated laboratory, can you escape from the russian scientist Ivan before it's too late? Collect the keycards and escape before you meet your demise!

name: Ivan Poe
summary: Ivan Poe is a third person find-your-way puzzle adventure following this cuboid character as they keep truckin' on through the Cosmic Soup.

name: Iveri: The 1.000 Story
summary: “Iveri: The 1.000 Story” is a a brief and very-to-the-point story about a woman (default name Iveri) who volunteer to be the next sacrifice to protect her village from demonic attacks.

name: I've Been Holding My Breath Since 2008
summary: After moving back to your parents' house, you find a box labeled 2008. Inside is a relic you thought was dead: an old slider phone. Surprisingly, it flickers to life, revealing a digital graveyard of who you used to be at eleven — an outsider, an artist, and a girl who was terrified of being seen.
